name: Rebirth (itch) (RobBCreates)
description:
This was my entry for the 2018 #1Gam game jam. I only started development at the end of the month and spent just less than two days on the project so a lot of the assets were imported but all of the mechanics and programming were created during these two days.  

I'd hoped to add more puzzles and trap types but I also wanted to allocate enough time for polish and ended up going for more polish. 

The theme this time was Rebirth.

Controls

Move - AD / Left analogue

Jump - Space / Gamepad - A 

Aim of the game

It's a meant to be a comical game about being reborn, a lot. Try it out and have fun in this short experience.  

Credits

Programming, Character Art & Animation, Story & Level Design: Rob Brooks

Level assets: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/platformer-starter-pack

Audio: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/pro-sound-collection
